welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Leopoldsburg, a charming city in the heart of Belgium known for its historic sites and beautiful nature. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kempen Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Kempen Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Zoersel Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers including shops, restaurants, and lounges.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Zoersel Airport is responsible for handling all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Eindhoven Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for low-cost and leisure airlines.

wifi.note: WiFi is free for the first hour, additional time can be purchased for a fee.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Maastricht/aachen Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Maastricht/aachen Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
